summary: This is an email chain from February 2020 discussing a Daily Mail article about an attorney who criticized Prince Andrew and vowed to pursue leads in the Epstein investigation. The emails contain internal commentary about the article and its implications.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of an attorney's criticism in a Daily Mail article about the Epstein probe; referenced as 'ducking' someone.

persons.name: Chuck Rhoades
persons.context: Mentioned in an email comparing the situation to his, suggesting he never had a prince avoiding him.

events.title: Daily Mail article publication
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article about an attorney who criticized Prince Andrew and promised to aggressively pursue leads in the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: An attorney publicly criticized Prince Andrew in February 2020 regarding the Epstein investigation.
The Daily Mail published an article titled 'Attorney who slammed Prince Andrew will ruthlessly pursue all leads in Epstein probe'.
Internal email commentary suggests the article was seen as significant and potentially damaging to Prince Andrew.
The email chain indicates awareness and discussion of media coverage related to the Epstein case among the correspondents.
